articles.excerpt: We wrap up the Jank Rank on Tarkir: Dragonstorm by looking at the last few legends in the set, then picking our most jankiest legend.

articles.value: The Top 10 Most Played Commander Cards from Aetherdrift
articles.excerpt: More and more folks are slotting Aetherdrift cards into their decks, but which cards are the most played? Nick goes through the list, crunches the numbers, and presents the most popular cards from Aetherdrift.
Sicken your opponents with a Typhoid Rat strategy helmed by an Assassin's Creed commander!
Ever wanted a review of half the commanders in a set? Read part one of Michael Celani's Aetherdrift Jank Rank review!
